entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
